channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Fall 2024 Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Monday, November 25, 2024 (all day) - Course evaluations for the Fall 2024 semester will open on Monday, November 25 and remain available through Wednesday, December 11. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please be sure to complete evaluation surveys for all your courses!
item.author: Students

item.title: Gateways Shuttle Service to be Available for Holiday/Winter Break
item.description: Rensselaer’s Department of Parking and Transportation is pleased to announce that it will once again be offering Gateways shuttle transportation to and from regional destination points - including the Amtrak train station, the Albany International Airport, and the Albany bus terminal - for the upcoming holiday/winter break. Be sure to submit your transportation request by Tuesday, December 17!
item.author: Students

item.title: Lally’s Rensselaer Finance Club Opens Applications for Positions in Student-Managed Investment Fund
item.description: Date: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 12:00 AM - Wed , December 11, 2024 12:00 AM - The Rensselaer Finance Club will be initiating a student-managed Investment Fund at the start of the Spring 2025 semester; students who are interested in managing real money and learning more about investment management should apply by December 11! Students from all degrees and disciplines are eligible for positions in the Fund.
item.author: Students

item.title: Don’t Miss the Campus Seasonal Celebration!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM - All Rensselaer students, faculty and staff are invited to attend this year’s Campus Seasonal Celebration, to be held in ECAV.
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Host Information Session December 13
item.description: Date: Friday, December 13, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph. D., as he reviews Rensselaer’s online, project-based graduate degrees and certificates, and describes how RPI Instructor Mentors provide industry expertise, advice, and mentorship in a targeted and experiential learning environment.
item.author: Community

item.title: Dr. Yinan Wang Selected for IBM-RPI FCRC Project
item.description: Dr. Yinan Wang’s proposal, “Model Optimization and Hardware-aware Neural Architecture Search for Spatiotemporal Data Mining,” was selected as a Future of Computing Research Collaboration (FCRC) project, a partnership between RPI and IBM. This research program is focused on developing a comprehensive framework for hardware-aware neural architecture search and model optimization for on-edge spatiotemporal data mining.
item.author: Community

item.title: Science Direct AI Search Pilot
item.description: RPI Libraries have been selected for early access to a feature leveraging Generative AI on ScienceDirect, home of the largest collection of peer-reviewed books and research journal articles. The AI feature searches through the full text of thousands of papers at once, looking for the insights most relevant for your specific needs.
item.author: Community

item.title: TIAA to Hold Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling December 18
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, December 18, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
